description:
Excel Data Analyst(Remote)
Interview:Phone+Skype
Job Description:
Position Details:

The client has a drop dead date to get the project completed in 5 months and an additional month needed for support. The resource with be responsible for standardizing data in 100's of different data types (Spread Sheets, PDFs, Data Dumps) and convert that data into a standardized format to upload into the clients system. The resource will also be responsible for Quality Control for their work and others work.

Excel skillset:

SUMIF and COUNTIF
MATCH
IF combined with AND/OR
INDEX MATCH
IFERROR
COUNT
FIND/SEARCH
REPLACE/SUBSTITUTION
PIVOT TABLES, SLICERS POWER PIVOTS
MACROS/VBA
CONDITIONAL FORMATTING
